title: [Medicine] Changes in the oral microbiome after drinking beetroot juice may promote healthy ageing and linked to healthier blood vessels and brain function. Beetroot and other foods are rich in inorganic nitrate, that oral bacteria can turn to nitric oxide, to help regulate blood vessels and neurotransmission.
[Health] Effect of the ketogenic diet on glycemic control, insulin resistance, and lipid metabolism in patients with T2DM: a systematic review and meta-analysis
